page.title: 04EDUCATION
page.content: School starts at 9.am ,a bell rings and a teacher sends us in to our classes .When we get to our classes our teacher takes the register.After register we go in to assembly,assembly goes on for about half an hour.After assembly we do maths or english until 10.35 am when we have break.Break is 20 minutes long and at break a lot of people play marbles.After break we carry on with maths and english.12.05 is the end of the morning,and it is lunch time.We get dismissed,by our teacher and we go to lunch.Lunch break is the longest break it lasts for one and a half hours.After lunch it is the after noon,we do games,art or reading. the after noon lasts 2 hours.At the end of the day four bells ring for us to go home.
